padContent:
PAD - PHP Application Driver

data

A A B A B A C
PHP
HTML
data/data1.html		 Result
&open;data 'myData'&close;
  [
    &open; "name": "joe",   "phone": "555-3425" &close;,
    &open; "name": "jim",   "phone": "555-2364" &close;,
    &open; "name": "jack",  "phone": "555-3422" &close;,
    &open; "name": "jerry", "phone": "555-4973" &close;
  ]
&open;/data&close;

<table>
  &open;myData&close;
    <tr>
      <td>&open;$name&close;</td> 
      <td>&open;$phone&close;</td>
    </tr>  
  &open;/myData&close;
</table>
PHP
HTML
data/data2.html		 Result
&open;data 'xml'&close;
  <data>
    <row name="bob"   phone="555-1111" />
    <row name="jim"   phone="555-2222" />
    <row name="joe"   phone="555-3333" />
    <row name="jerry" phone="555-4444" />
  </data>
&open;/data&close;

&open;data 'json'&close;
  [
    &open; "name": "bob",   "phone": "555-5555" &close;,
    &open; "name": "jim",   "phone": "555-6666" &close;,
    &open; "name": "joe",   "phone": "555-7777" &close;,      
    &open; "name": "jerry", "phone": "555-8888" &close;
  ]
&open;/data&close;

&open;data 'yaml'&close;
  ---
  - name: bob
    phone: 555-3425
  - name: jim
    phone: 555-4364
  - name: joe
    phone: 555-3422
  - name: jerry
    phone: 555-4973
&open;/data&close;

&open;data 'csv' , type='csv'&close;
  name,phone
  bob,555-3425
  jim,555-4364
  joe,555-3422
  jerry,555-4973
&open;/data&close;

&open;list 'xml;json;yaml;csv'&close;
  <p>
  <table border=1>
    <tr><th colspan="2">&open;$list&close;</th></tr>
    &open;dummy data='$list'&close;
      <tr>
        <td>&open;$name&close;</td> 
        <td>&open;$phone&close;</td>
      </tr>
    &open;/dummy&close;
  </table>
&open;/list&close; 
PHP
HTML
data/data2.html		 Result
&open;data 'xml'&close;
  <data>
    <row name="bob"   phone="555-1111" />
    <row name="jim"   phone="555-2222" />
    <row name="joe"   phone="555-3333" />
    <row name="jerry" phone="555-4444" />
  </data>
&open;/data&close;

&open;data 'json'&close;
  [
    &open; "name": "bob",   "phone": "555-5555" &close;,
    &open; "name": "jim",   "phone": "555-6666" &close;,
    &open; "name": "joe",   "phone": "555-7777" &close;,      
    &open; "name": "jerry", "phone": "555-8888" &close;
  ]
&open;/data&close;

&open;data 'yaml'&close;
  ---
  - name: bob
    phone: 555-3425
  - name: jim
    phone: 555-4364
  - name: joe
    phone: 555-3422
  - name: jerry
    phone: 555-4973
&open;/data&close;

&open;data 'csv' , type='csv'&close;
  name,phone
  bob,555-3425
  jim,555-4364
  joe,555-3422
  jerry,555-4973
&open;/data&close;

&open;list 'xml;json;yaml;csv'&close;
  <p>
  <table border=1>
    <tr><th colspan="2">&open;$list&close;</th></tr>
    &open;dummy data='$list'&close;
      <tr>
        <td>&open;$name&close;</td> 
        <td>&open;$phone&close;</td>
      </tr>
    &open;/dummy&close;
  </table>
&open;/list&close; 
PHP
HTML
data/data3.html		 Result
&open;data 'myCSV', type='csv'&close;
  name,phone
  jack,555-3425
  jim,555-4364
  joe,555-3422
  jerry,555-4973
&open;/data&close;

&open;data&close;
  [
    &open;myCSV&close;
      &open; "name": "&open;$name&close;", "phone": "&open;$phone&close;" &close;&open;notLast&close;,&open;/notLast&close;
    &open;/myCSV&close;
  ]
&open;/data 'myJSON'&close;

&open;data&close;
  <records>
    &open;myJSON&close;
      <record name="&open;$name&close;" phone="&open;$phone&close;"/>
    &open;/myJSON&close;
  </records>
&open;/data 'myXML'&close;

&open;data&close;
  ---
    &open;myXML&close;
    - name: &open;$name&close;
      phone: &open;$phone&close;
    &open;/myXML&close;
&open;/data 'myYAML'&close;

<table>
  &open;myYAML&close;
    <tr>
      <td>&open;$name&close;</td> 
      <td>&open;$phone&close;</td>
    </tr>
  &open;/myYAML&close;
</table>
PHP
HTML
data/data3.html		 Result
&open;data 'myCSV', type='csv'&close;
  name,phone
  jack,555-3425
  jim,555-4364
  joe,555-3422
  jerry,555-4973
&open;/data&close;

&open;data&close;
  [
    &open;myCSV&close;
      &open; "name": "&open;$name&close;", "phone": "&open;$phone&close;" &close;&open;notLast&close;,&open;/notLast&close;
    &open;/myCSV&close;
  ]
&open;/data 'myJSON'&close;

&open;data&close;
  <records>
    &open;myJSON&close;
      <record name="&open;$name&close;" phone="&open;$phone&close;"/>
    &open;/myJSON&close;
  </records>
&open;/data 'myXML'&close;

&open;data&close;
  ---
    &open;myXML&close;
    - name: &open;$name&close;
      phone: &open;$phone&close;
    &open;/myXML&close;
&open;/data 'myYAML'&close;

<table>
  &open;myYAML&close;
    <tr>
      <td>&open;$name&close;</td> 
      <td>&open;$phone&close;</td>
    </tr>
  &open;/myYAML&close;
</table>
PHP
HTML
data/local.html		 Result
&open;content 'myContent'&close;

  <p><table border=1>

    <tr>
      <th> department </th>
      <th> manager </th>
      <th> phone </th>
    </tr>

    @start@
      <tr>
        <td> &open;$department&close; </td>
        <td> &open;$manager&close; </td>
        <td> &open;$phone&close; </td>
      </tr>
    @end@

  </table>

&open;/content&close;

&open;xml 'departments', content='myContent'&close;
&open;json 'departments', content='myContent'&close;
&open;yaml 'departments', content='myContent'&close;
&open;csv 'departments', content='myContent'&close;

&open;myContent xml='departments'&close;
&open;myContent json='departments'&close;
&open;myContent yaml='departments'&close;
&open;myContent csv='departments'&close;
PHP
HTML
data/local.html		 Result
&open;content 'myContent'&close;

  <p><table border=1>

    <tr>
      <th> department </th>
      <th> manager </th>
      <th> phone </th>
    </tr>

    @start@
      <tr>
        <td> &open;$department&close; </td>
        <td> &open;$manager&close; </td>
        <td> &open;$phone&close; </td>
      </tr>
    @end@

  </table>

&open;/content&close;

&open;yaml 'departments', content='myContent'&close;
&open;csv 'departments', content='myContent'&close;

&open;myContent yaml='departments'&close;
&open;myContent csv='departments'&close;
padExampleSrcHtml:
&open;content 'myContent'&close;

  <p><table border=1>

    <tr>
      <th> department </th>
      <th> manager </th>
      <th> phone </th>
    </tr>

    @start@
      <tr>
        <td> &open;$department&close; </td>
        <td> &open;$manager&close; </td>
        <td> &open;$phone&close; </td>
      </tr>
    @end@

  </table>

&open;/content&close;

&open;xml 'departments', content='myContent'&close;
&open;json 'departments', content='myContent'&close;
&open;yaml 'departments', content='myContent'&close;
&open;csv 'departments', content='myContent'&close;

&open;myContent yaml='departments'&close;
&open;myContent csv='departments'&close;
padOutput:
PAD - PHP Application Driver

data

A A B A B A C
PHP
HTML
data/data1.html		 Result
{data 'myData'}
  [
    { "name": "joe",   "phone": "555-3425" },
    { "name": "jim",   "phone": "555-2364" },
    { "name": "jack",  "phone": "555-3422" },
    { "name": "jerry", "phone": "555-4973" }
  ]
{/data}

<table>
  {myData}
    <tr>
      <td>{$name}</td> 
      <td>{$phone}</td>
    </tr>  
  {/myData}
</table>
PHP
HTML
data/data2.html		 Result
{data 'xml'}
  <data>
    <row name="bob"   phone="555-1111" />
    <row name="jim"   phone="555-2222" />
    <row name="joe"   phone="555-3333" />
    <row name="jerry" phone="555-4444" />
  </data>
{/data}

{data 'json'}
  [
    { "name": "bob",   "phone": "555-5555" },
    { "name": "jim",   "phone": "555-6666" },
    { "name": "joe",   "phone": "555-7777" },      
    { "name": "jerry", "phone": "555-8888" }
  ]
{/data}

{data 'yaml'}
  ---
  - name: bob
    phone: 555-3425
  - name: jim
    phone: 555-4364
  - name: joe
    phone: 555-3422
  - name: jerry
    phone: 555-4973
{/data}

{data 'csv' , type='csv'}
  name,phone
  bob,555-3425
  jim,555-4364
  joe,555-3422
  jerry,555-4973
{/data}

{list 'xml;json;yaml;csv'}
  <p>
  <table border=1>
    <tr><th colspan="2">{$list}</th></tr>
    {dummy data='$list'}
      <tr>
        <td>{$name}</td> 
        <td>{$phone}</td>
      </tr>
    {/dummy}
  </table>
{/list} 
PHP
HTML

    <row name="jim"   phone="555-2222" />

    <row name="jerry" phone="555-4444" />

{content 'myContent'}

  <p><table border=1>

      <th> department </th>
